newsitem.title: ITALY: State of Italian economy points to rate cut-Ciampi.
newsitem.headline: State of Italian economy points to rate cut-Ciampi.

text.p: An eventual cut in Italian interest rates is becoming more likely given the state of the economy, Treasury Minister Carlo Azeglio Ciampi said on Wednesday.

"The performance of the Italian economy shows clear signs of (a move) towards a reduction in interest rates," Ciampi told the Chamber of Deputies after being asked by a parliamentarian why the Bank of Italy had not cut rates since January.
